code:
A.Compose([
    # Flips
    A.HorizontalFlip(p=0.5),
    A.VerticalFlip(p=0.2),  # upside-down rotations

    # Rotations & scaling
    A.ShiftScaleRotate(
        shift_limit=0.05,
        scale_limit=0.15,
        rotate_limit=180,  # allow full upside-down rotations
        border_mode=cv2.BORDER_CONSTANT,
        interpolation=cv2.INTER_NEAREST,
        p=0.7
    ),

    # Perspective / geometric
    A.Perspective(scale=(0.05, 0.1), p=0.3),

    # Color / brightness
    A.RandomBrightnessContrast(
        brightness_limit=0.2, 
        contrast_limit=0.1,
        p=0.3
    ),

    # Noise / blur
    A.GaussNoise(p=0.3),
    A.MotionBlur(blur_limit=3, p=0.2),
    A.MedianBlur(blur_limit=3, p=0.2),

])
